com.psychic_engine.cmput301w17t10.feelsappman.Controllers

Class ElasticMoodController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psychic_engine.cmput301w17t10.feelsappman.Controllers.ElasticController
      • com.psychic_engine.cmput301w17t10.feelsappman.Controllers.ElasticMoodController

  • public class ElasticMoodController
extends ElasticController
    ElasticMoodController handles any changes regarding moods, whether it would be updating, deleting, or adding moods. Main method is to obtain the mood events in relation to the participant currently using the app, then utilize the offline filtering to handle the required features that a mood event should have such as mood, reason, and date. How to use: ElasticMoodController.x task_name = new ElasticMoodController.x (x is the method task you want to use ie. FilterMoodByReasonTask) task_name.execute(parameters)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ElasticMoodController.AddMoodEventTask
      AddMoodEventTask adds a mood event into the elastic server.
      static class  ElasticMoodController.AddOfflineMoodEventTask
      Add Task that utilizes an arraylist of mood events that handles the offline mood events that needs to be added into the server upon online reconnection.
      static class  ElasticMoodController.DeleteMoodEventTask
      DeleteMoodEventTask is used when the participant would like to delete their mood events.
      static class  ElasticMoodController.DeleteOfflineMoodEventTask
      DeleteTask that handles an arraylist of mood events to properly bulk delete.
      static class  ElasticMoodController.UpdateMoodTask
      Update task to editMoodEvent the mood events as you try to edit your mood.
      static class  ElasticMoodController.UpdateOfflineMoodTask
      Update task that utilizes the arraylist of mood events that needs to be editted upon reconnection of the network
